remediation: Upgrade systemd/systemd to version 248.13, 249.17, 250.14, 251.20, 252.21, 253.15, 254.8, 255.2 or higher.
title: Insufficient Verification of Data Authenticity

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Insufficient Verification of Data Authenticity due to improper validation of DNSSEC signatures in systemd-resolved . If the default DNSSEC=no option has been changed to yes , an attacker in a MitM position can manipulate DNS records.
